input: A bill presented in Parliament becomes an Act after

options.A: It is passed by both the Houses.
options.B: The president has given his assent
options.C: The Prime Minister has signed it
options.D: The Supreme Court has declared it to be within the competence of the Union Parliament

explanation: Under article 53 power of president mentioned. Any bill presented in parliament becomes an act after presidentâ€™s assent
